summary: THE OIL COOLER LINE (4.3W) ON MY CHEVY S10 BLAZER CAME OUT OF THE CRIMP AND CAUSED CONSIDERABLE DAMAGE TO MY ENGINE.  THE DEALER WHO SOLD AND DOES WORK ON THIS VEHICLE SAYS IT IS NOT THEIR FAULT AND THE REPAIR PRICE TAG IS QUITE A LARGE SUM!  I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW WHY AND HOW CAN CHEVY LET A "DEFECT" OF THIS MAGNITUDE GO UNNOTICED!  I DO NOT FEEL IT IS MY RESPONSIBILITY TO PAY FOR THIS REPAIR!*JB
